НО ПРИ ЭТОМ ТЕБЯ СКОРЕЕ ВСЕГО кинет к задротам у которых под 2-4к часиков в игре но и это еще не все СУРВЫ ЖЕ НЕ МОГУТ ЖДАТЬ 2-3 МИНУТЫ У НИХ НАЧИНАЕТ ГОРЕТЬ А ПОЧЕМУ ЭТО ЛОББИ ТАК ДОЛГО ЗАПОЛНЯЕТСЯ А ПОЙДУ КА Я ОТ СЮДА А ТО ЗАЧЕМ МНЕ ДОЛГО ЖДАТЬ Я ЛУЧШЕ НОВОЕ ЛОББИ НАЙДУ И ТАМ ПОСИЖУ А НА ТОГО МАНА ДА ПОФИГ ПУСКАЙ СЕБЕ СИДИТ И ЖДЕТ .
Бывают конечно исключения и матч находится быстро но есть одно ОГРОМНОЕ НО ТЕБЯ СКОРЕЕ ВСЕГО КИНУЛО К КИТАЙЦАМ ИЛИ КОРЕЙЦЕМ К КОТОРЫМ ТЫ ДАЖЕ ПРИТРОНУТСЯ НЕ СМОЖЕШЬ ИБО ИХ ПИНГ РАБОТАЕТ ПРОТИВ МАНА ТЕБЕ НЕВЕРОЯТНО СИЛЬНО ПОВЕЗЕТ ЕСЛИ ТЫ ПО НИМ ВООБЩЕ ПОПАДЕШЬ ХОТЯБЫ 1 РАЗ хотите во что-то сыграть но не знайте во что? скачайте майнкрафт будет куда интереснее и если вы все же купите эту игру что ну вот не стоит делать покупка длс вообще отдельная тема если в игре теперь есть даже СУВЕНИРЫ НУ ВОТ ЗАЧЕМ ОНИ? ах да забыл добавить про донатные шмотки которые отличаются просто расцветкой.
Года 2 назад разработчики говорили про планы на игру мол вот вы получите 3-4 платных глав и будет 1 полноценная глава с сурвом,картой,маном все как обычно но они просто ЛОЖАТ НА ЭТО ВСЕ БОЛЬШОЙ БОЛТ И ВЫПУСКАЮТ 1 ПЕРСОНАЖА ПРОСТО 1 ПЕРСОНАЖА И НАЗЫВАЮТ ЭТОТ ..... ГЛАВОЙ ..
С ТАКИМИ РАЗРАБАМИ ПРОСТО НЕ НУЖНО БРАТЬ ЭТУ ИГРУ ИГРАЙТЕ ВО ЧТО-НИБУТЬ ПО ЛУЧШЕ

跟朋友一起开黑依旧可以找到当初的快感。至于屠夫跟幸存者的平衡问题，我觉得不是重点。因为，除了一部分顶尖玩家来讲，对其余人来说，影响并不是很大。这个游戏最重要的问题其实是服务器，各种错误代码，体验太差了。但依旧推荐。
Хороший геймплей, затягивает, особенно, если играть со своей компашкой. Все прям охуенно, если бы не ЕБУЧИЕ КЕМПЕРЫ КОТОРЫЕ ВЕШАЮТ НАХУЙ НА КРЮК И СТОЯТ СМОТРЯТ КАК НА СИСЬКИ СВОЕЙ МАМАШИ

虽然只玩了很短时间，但是看直播的时间挺多。20级玩人类能遇到全技能的20级屠夫带红处，当然也有20级的全技能人类，刷成这样真的没意思。
这游戏虽然是有一定的技术和套路的要求，但是主要还是背地图才能玩好，纯粹是耗时间的活。每个障碍能绕多少圈也是固定的，根本不怕屠夫追，变成了一种无聊的追逐。

游戏非常不错，但服务器较差，不过我不跟风给差评。
我最想说的就是新手生还者们，先去网上看看教程或者看看视频也好，好多新手第一个被抓了不说，还不给队友争取时间，一直挣脱导致立刻挂掉，队友想救你都来不及。
新人们一定要记着，挣脱会让你更快的挂掉，你第一个被挂钩了不要挣脱不要动，没人救你也别生气，到了最后空格时刻你在按空格，要想想队友给他们争取点时间，还有不要总跑着走，屠夫比你高将近半个人呢，你这一跑惊扰了乌鸦或高草丛乱动，屠夫能看不到你？

以上这些是人类生存者的基本入门。

UPD спустя полтора года решил переписать свой обзор. прочитал его и понял, что менять то и нечего

19.03.2019 UPD: зашёл навестить игру, и при первой же попытке найти матч словил бесконечную загрузку. У разработчиков не получается пофиксить вечную загрузку, зато отлично получается выпускать миллион однообразных платных ДЛС с имбовыми киллерами и заниматься фанконтентом в виде жопастых телочек и скинов (ирония в том, что на заре игры разработчик заявлял об исключении появления "фансервисных" скинов и дизайнов персонажей). Молчу уже об отвратительной графике, которая не собирается меняться, бестолковом освещении, кривых анимациях, в целом о дизайне персонажей - взгляд на 2000 ярдов кажется милой улыбкой по сравнению с физиономиями выживших. Ну, и оптимизация в сделку не входила. Я застал то время, когда игру переносили со старой версии движка на новый. По заявкам разработчика ожидалось сначала улучшение ФПС, затем уже почему то "улучшение ИЛИ ПО КРАЙНЕЙ МЕРЕ не ухудшение." В общем, по итогу для комфортной игры, на моем компьютере понадобилось пересесть со средних настроек на низкие, потому что с новым движком 40 кадров мгновенно обратились в 25 с фризами стабильно каждые 4-6 секунд. И в тот момент никаких, СОВЕРШЕННО никаких графических или технических улучшений не произошло.

24.02.2021 UPD: сделал -4 на медичке? получи ошибку подключения и бан :) А еще проверь целостность файлов, потому что мы не умеем делать полноценные обновления, и простой апдейт со сдвигом элементов интерфейса ломает игру и крашит

Dead by Daylight é um jogo muito bom, passa um clima de terror e tensão, principalmente enquanto faz os objetivos do jogo (geradores).

Jogar sozinho não é dificil, porém com amigos acaba sendo mais fácil e divertido.

DbD não possui chat interno ou chat por voz (durante a partida), o que acaba complicando a comunicação entre os players, mas isso não é um defeito, e sim um desafio a mais.

No geral o jogo é ótimo, e o recomendo bastante.
虽然刷血点改档以及bug问题是这个游戏的主要被人诟病的问题。但是不可否认这任然是款很棒的游戏！
El juego es buenísimo, recomendado 99%, 1% no por que hay muchos Bugs y no hay servidores hechos por la compañía, el asesino hace el Server lo que a veces provoca lag
优化感人,BUG也太多了,以后不要跟风买游戏

Bom para começar devo logo dizer que se você é um fã do Michael Myers, assim como eu, você vai lembrar da música dele toda vez que iniciar o jogo kkkkk. Esse jogo foi um marco importante na minha vida; Horas de diversões com amigos e também muita raiva pra quando você morre para um trapper camper. Mas em fim ... vamos para a análise.

PONTOS NEGATIVOS:

- Jogo quando saiu era MUITO mal optmizado, hoje em dia comparando ao que era está muito melhor, mas mesmo assim você presencia uma queda de fps uma vez ou outra na vida.
- CAMPERS, eles aos poucos estão acabando com a graça do jogo ( não digo que o jogo está ruim, isso nunca ). Mas as vezes inrrita, o cara joga de trapper ( o que coloca armadilha ), ele te coloca no gancho e logo em seguida coloca uma trap embaixo de você ( até aí, ok ! ) O problema é que em vez de ele sair e deixar lá para alguém cair na armadilha, ele fica parado ... OLHANDO PARA A SUA CARA.
- DLCS. Não que o conteúdo delas seja ruim, mas que naverdade muito deles poderiam ser disponibilizados gratuítamente dentro do jogo, não havia necessidade de cobrar algo a mais, porque o jogo é bém pobre em costumização e personagens ( fica bom com as dlcs é claro ), mas no vanilla você só vai se importar em jogar.
- Atualizações. Os produtores ficam pensando em lançar dlc nova em vez de procurar melhorar o jogo, eles fizeram um trabalho fantásticos o problema é q são muito egoístas e não admitem que o jogo possuí determinados problemas.
- Entre outras coisas que não são tão relevantes a ponto de sitar.

PONTOS NEUTROS:

- Bugs. Sim, você não leu errado. Alguns são chatos e atrapalham. Mas a maioria é muito engraçado e vai te proporcionar risadas até umas horas.

PONTOS POSITIVOS:

- Esses vão de vocês, mas o jogo é muito divertido e em time fica realmente muito gostoso de jogar.
- O suspense que o jogo da, e o medo quando o killer aparece atrás de você do nada.
- A emoção de quando você acerta a paleta na cara do killer, no último milésimo antes de ele te dar a facada. O Drible no geral é muito legal quando você vê q o cara ta completamente perdido te procurando.
- Já como killer o sorrizo de psicopata q você faz ao matar todo mundo logo no início da partida kkkkkk
- Entre outras diversas coisas.

Bom, mas apesar de todos os pontos negativos eu realmente recomendo esse jogo, REALMENTE se você tiver amigos que o joguem, só que se n tiver, n fique chateado, dentro do jogo você pd conhecer pessoas que compartilhem sua experiência com você, então boa sorte e bom jogo :)

It's a fun game to play, don't get me wrong! It's very fun when you play with your friends or alone, and it has some very cool concepts in game, such as a unique leveling system along with perks exclusive to each character you play as. However there are several problems with this game. The first one being that it sometimes takes fucking years to get into a game, then when you finally get into a lobby sometimes you randomely get booted out when loading into the game, or for some reason you can get sent right back to the menu where you clicked "Join a Lobby" and you don't even get placed into a lobby. Not to mention dc'ers the people who leave in the midst of loading into the game making it a 3v1, 2v1 or 1v1 situation all of which are virtually unwinnable. For some reason there is also people that just afk in the lobby and don't ready up, which makes you wait the entire 60 seconds until you all finally load into the game, but once you finally load in that one afk person is now out of the game... In conclusion I would not pick up this game in it's current states, even though the devs do stream on twitch sometimes they still fail to work on fixing the problem at hand, the games matchmaking system and dealing with lobby afkers and dc'ers.

EXTRA NOTES: If you click "Survive with Friends" it does make it a whole lot easier to get into games most of the time, however sometimes (for me atleast) it won't let me click it...
Also regarding the new patch (1.4.0) that was just released, it now seems that its even harder to get into a lobby. The games matchmaking system is still aids, no wonder this community is toxic, it's due to the lazy ass devs who can't seem to get around to fixing the matchmaking system. Also because of the new engine that was recently added to the game, the gameplay is a lot choppier where before it use to be fairly smooth for me, also for some reason alternating between A and D seems a bit off and laggy when trying to escape from the killer.

UPDATE: The devs seemed to have fixed most of the errors at this point, sometimes it is still hard to find a game for some reason. But other than this the game is still very playable and fun, especially when playing with friends.

Conclusion: All in all I wouldn't recommend buying this game for while, to be honest with you with devs like this, I think the game is a complete waste of money, yes I do still play it a lot but the game is very addicting as long as you have some patience like I do.

Don't listen to the bad reviews, the game works just fine despite sometimes there being issue with matchmaking. Honestly the game is great, no killer is op and its always possible to win as either role. Whenever there's an issue just wait it out they always check out reported issues. The Shape isnt op, anyone can beat him you just have to be good at the game. 
Overall the game is good, only recommendations is to have good wifi, and patience. 
Remember if there's ever an issue just report it.

[h1] This game is horrible but it is pretty good [/h1]

Dead by daylight is a pretty good game (see how I have over 1,200 hrs of my life "wasted" on it so far)
I have never played a game in my life I love just as much as I hate, but it's not that I hate hate it, it's just that it's a really good game but BHVR always take 2 steps forward then 5 backwards with updates.

Hey listen if you are a horror fan sure get the game and play it, it's the single best online horror game ever, Dead by daylight is the smash bros of horror at this point and I don't see any other games coming close any time soon.

The game is pretty good but can get stale if you don't try and mix things up, but I mean the fact this game only has one game mode and is this big should tell you something though.

Also this game has to be one of the most toxic games I have ever played in my life, it's on the same level as Rainbow 6 for being toxic (and that's a lot) but thanks to crossplay a lot of toxic chat has died off now but it's still there, you always have survs crying about "OP" killers, or you have killers crying about "OP" surv perks and so on.

The only thing OP in this game is keys and moris but the devs are already working on them they said so that's good to hear.



Anyway this has been more of a rant of someone that loves and hates the game rather than a review but what I do have to say is, this game is pretty fun so get it and enjoy it and don't let others tell you how to play or what perks you can't run on someone, Dead by daylight has a lot of different ways to play every killer and many ways to play surv so explore and find what ones you enjoy. 

So yea get the game (also one last thing this game may seem like a lot if you are new to it, so I recommend checking out a lovely man on youtube called "otzdarva", he goes over a lot in the game and explains it for new and veteran players so yea check him out)

I am gonna allow comments on this too so if you wanna ask a question on the game you can or just anything else.

El juego no lo merece, tiene muchisimos bugs que nos lo REMBOLSEN !!
No puedo jugar ni cambiando de server ni nada y cumplo los requisitos de sobra, muchisimos bug y no se puede encontrar partida, luego hay que comprar personajes a parte. En resumen una estafa para ganar dinero que nisiquiera está bien realizada. LIKE PARA REMBOLSO DEL QUE NO QUIERA TENER UN JUEGO QUE NO FUNCIONA.

Всё ждал, когда пофиксят баги и приведут баланс в игре в играбельное состояние. Но нет. Игры за выжившего не получается, потому что маньяку выгодно находиться возле тебя с крюком, пока ты не сдохнешь. С каждой версией возможности выживших всё больше урезают, из-за этого все начинают играть за маньяка и приходится долго ждать, когда команда из 4 человек соберётся. Багов просто огромная тонна. Удовольствия от игры никакого, хотя по началу было интересно играть за выжившего. Если будете покупать игру, только для того, чтобы играть за маньяка. И будете тупые дрочеры-кемперы ждать часами, когда выжившие подтянутся. Убили весь геймплей!

Previous I had written a review saying how much I hated how buggy this game was. I realized after starting to play it again recently that I should probably change it, so here it goes:

When I first bought and started the game, it was super buggy but fun. I did not want to give up on it because I enjoyed the game in concept. I tried repeatedly to play, and the bugs would refuse to let me. However, I had recently picked up the game again to see if it had any changes. It had changes... LOTS of changes. The lay-out and menu were way more pleasing to look at, the queues were actually responsive, and I got the bonus of coming into the game when 3 new killers had come out, so it felt so extraordinarily new that it felt like I just bought it. They kept the game in its concept, fixed the bugs, and they added new mechanics that made everything more interesting. I couldn't have been happier to come back to these changes. I definitely am willing to change my previous not recommend to a recommend.

TL;DR They fixed everything I had previously had issues with before dropping the game for a while, and I came back to a game that I am thoroughly pleased with again and more.

Played this game since day one. Love this game, but the updated perks are horrible. The game use to be OP survivors and OP killers. You had to be the better player/thinker to be able to win ( no matter what perks you had). Now they just nerfed majority of good survivor perks trying to make the game *fresh. Good job on making a game from good to bad. They need to just make a dbd 2 and make the game all over with more specialized perks and stop making so many perks.
